title: Waistcoat, 1751–1800
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: embroidered on satin
description: White satin with polychrome silk embroidery and green and brown chenille. Small floral sprays scattered over the ground. Down the center, a series of fish of many different types. Cut straight across the bottom. Pockets are straight.

tombstone.epitaph:
Waistcoat, 1751–1800.Medium: silk, linen
Technique: embroidered on satin. 1905-11-1.
